metrics.name: Automation rate for invoice clearing
metrics.description: Percentage of automated invoice clearing events. For example 'Clear Invoice' events that are not performed by a Dialog user

metrics.name: Manual invoice posting
metrics.description: Invoices that have been posted manually, for example by a dialog user
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM(
	(SELECT COUNT(event_name) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN (${itp_invoice_posting_events_vim})
			AND (${itp_manual_condition_vim})))))

metrics.name: Missing Data Rate per Document
metrics.description: Percentage of VIM documents with missing data, for example missing mandatory information, company codes, etc.
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(DISTINCT "VIM Document ID") FILTER (WHERE
	"VIM Missing Mandatory Information" = 1 OR
	"VIM Missing Company Code" = 1 OR
    "VIM Missing Gross Amount" = 1 OR
    "VIM Missing Date of Supply" = 1 OR
    "VIM Missing Invoice Date" = 1
   )
/COUNT(DISTINCT "VIM Document ID") *100

metrics.name: Invalid Data Rate per Document
metrics.description: Percentage of VIM documents with invaid data, for example invalid requisitioner, invalid vendor, etc.
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(DISTINCT "VIM Document ID") FILTER (WHERE
	"VIM Invalid Currency" = 1 OR
	"VIM Invalid Requisitioner" = 1 OR
	"VIM Invalid Vendor" = 1 OR
	"VIM Invalid Vendor VAT Number" = 1 OR
	"VIM Invalid Tax Info" = 1 OR
	"VIM Invalid PO ID" = 1 OR
	"VIM Invalid Requester ID" = 1 OR
	"VIM Invalid Recipient VAT Number" = 1
   )
/COUNT(DISTINCT "VIM Document ID") *100

metrics.name: Percentage of document being sent back to AP
metrics.description: Percentage of documents that are sent back to AP because of errors
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES('Send Invoice Back to AP'))
/
COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: Suspected Duplicate Rate per Document
metrics.description: Percentage of suspected duplicates per document
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(DISTINCT "VIM Document ID") FILTER (WHERE
	"VIM Suspected Duplicate" = 1
   )
/COUNT(DISTINCT "VIM Document ID") *100

metrics.name: Average Validation Time
metrics.description: Average time of Send for Validation to Validation Complete
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
	WHERE event_name IN ('Validation Complete')) 
	-
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
    WHERE event_name IN ('Send for Validation'))
)

variables.name: itp_automation_condition_vim
variables.description: Condition indicating that an event was automated, for example "Event Created By User Type" <> 'Dialog'

variables.name: itp_clear_invoice_events_vim
variables.description: Event identifying the clearing of an invoice, for example 'Clear Invoice'

variables.name: itp_manual_condition_vim
variables.description: Condition indicating that an event was manual, for example "Event Created By User Type" = 'Dialog'

variables.name: itp_invoice_posting_events_vim
variables.description: Events identifying the posting of invoice items, for example 'Post Invoice'
